original_title: 昆十：大天才吴昊昊愛王年年
overview: An independent film director visits his family's home in Taiyuan, where he discusses love, marriage, and family with his mother and shows Pasolini's DECAMERON to his father. He returns to Beijing after the Chinese New Year celebrations and pursues sex and love.
title: kun10: Super genius Wu haohao loves Wang niannian
